meanings.definition: The action of one object coming forcibly into contact with another.
meanings.sent1: The impacts of the two cars colliding caused a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The earthquake had significant impacts on the buildings in the city.
meanings.sent3: The impacts of the basketball hitting the hoop made a funny sound.
meanings.sent4: The impacts of the storm hitting the coast were devastating.
meanings.sent5: The impacts of the hammer hitting the nail were clearly visible.

meanings.sent1: The positive impacts of exercise on health are well-documented.
meanings.sent2: The new policy had immediate impacts on the company's profits.
meanings.sent3: The impacts of eating too much cake can be quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The impacts of her words on him were like a powerful wave.
meanings.sent5: The impacts of the decision were etched in everyone's memory.
